params._newMerkleRoot: calculated root-hash of merkle-tree off-chain to facilitate the whitelist process

params._newPreSaleDate: the new pre-sale date to change.

params._newPublicSaleDate: the new public-sale date to change.

params._newRevealDate: the new reveal date to change.

params._init_pre_sale_price: is the price that will defined in public sale phase
params._merkle_root: is the hash of merkle tree used for whitelist algorithm     It'll calculated off-chain.

params._tokenURI: is the ipfs hash which contains the NFT metadata. Invariant: the tokenId is always less than COLLECTION_MAX_SUPPLY.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

royaltyInfo(uint256,uint256).details: Returns how much royalty is owed and to whom, based on a sale price that may be denominated in any unit of exchange. The royalty amount is denominated and should be paid in that same unit of exchange.

params._tokenId: is the tokenId of that NFT you want its tokenURI.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._merkleProof: calculated merkle-tree off-chain to facilitate the whitelist process/

changeMerkleRoot(bytes32).notice: onlyOwner of the contract could call this function.

changePreSaleDate(uint256).notice: changing the pre-defined pre-sale date if it's necessary.this function is only callable from the contract owner - it doesn't effect on Decentralization.

changePublicSaleDate(uint256).notice: changing the pre-defined pre-sale date if it's necessary.this function is only callable from the contract owner - it doesn't effect on Decentralization.

changeRevealDate(uint256).notice: changing the pre-defined pre-sale date if it's necessary.this function is only callable from the contract owner - it doesn't effect on Decentralization.

constructor.notice: using Ownable to give access to the contract deployer won't effect on centralization     owner accessability restricted to managing phase that we are in, not manipulating critical functionlaities.

init_pre_sale_price().notice: is the price of NFTs in pre-sale phase.

mintNFT(string).notice: this function is callable in public sale phase.

startPublicSale().notice: NOTE: Based on the modifier if this function calls means that we are in REVEAL phase     so the time is definitely after the REVEAL phase time, so we don't need to check the time again.

tokenURI(uint256).notice: getting ipfs url (represent tokenURI) to get correspond tokenId NFT metadata.

whiteListMint(bytes32[]).notice: Eligible user will call this function to mint his NFT in pre-sale phase.

documentation.text: @notice when caller of the whitelist function is not included in whitelist.
@notice this error will occurr when the off-chain caluclated merkle-tree hashs are not calcualted.
@notice when user wants to mint his NFT token in whitelist for second time.
@notice when owner of this contract wants to change the merkle-root hash, but it's same with the last one.
@notice when someone who is not the owner of the NFT wants to perform something on that asset.
@notice when minting counter exceeds max supply
@notice when mentioned NFT (via tokenId) has not minted.
@notice change revealed state variable in an unappropriate time.
@notice change pre-sale status in an unappropriate time.
@notice change phase to public sale in an unappropriate time.
@notice when an unappropriate function will call in a wrong time.
@notice when msg.value be less than the nft minting price.
@notice will trigger in whitelist mint and public sale mint if user's balance is less than required.
@notice when owner wants to change the collection's phase period times with a same value as it's defined before.
@notice is the price of NFTs in pre-sale phase.
@notice is the date in block.timestamp which pre-sale phase starts.
@notice is the data that collection reveal will occurr.
@notice is the date in block.timestamp which public-sale phase starts.
@notice is the current phase that we are in, based on PHASE enum.
@notice totalMinted is the total NFT minted during all phases.
@notice is the root-hash of merkle tree which calculated off-chain.

@param _newMerkleRoot calculated root-hash of merkle-tree off-chain to facilitate the whitelist process
 @notice onlyOwner of the contract could call this function.

@param _merkleProof calculated merkle-tree off-chain to facilitate the whitelist process/
 @notice Eligible user will call this function to mint his NFT in pre-sale phase.

NOTE: Based on the modifier if this function calls means that we are in REVEAL phase
     so the time is definitely after the REVEAL phase time, so we don't need to check the time again.
@notice there is no time-overflow until 2106 AC.
